headline: Miller Introduces Forged in Freedom™ Helmet in Support of America’s Warrior Partnership
summary: APPLETON, Wis., October 27, 2025--Miller Electric Mfg. LLC, a leading worldwide manufacturer of Miller® brand arc welding equipment, announces the release of its newest graphic helmet design in the Digital Elite™ Series, Forged in Freedom. For every Forged in Freedom helmet sold during the month of November, Miller will donate $10 per helmet to America’s Warrior Partnership to support U.S. veterans and their families.
